title: Indexing & Performance Optimization
description: Optimize a high-traffic blog platform by implementing MongoDB indexes, analyzing query performance, and applying advanced optimization techniques for production-scale applications.
short_description: Master MongoDB performance by optimizing a high-traffic blog platform
learning_objectives: Create and manage MongoDB indexes for optimal performance
Analyze query performance using explain() and profiling
Implement compound indexes and understand index strategies
Use text indexes for full-text search capabilities
Apply geospatial indexes for location-based queries
Optimize queries and understand index selection
real_world_connection: Performance optimization is critical for high-traffic applications like Medium, WordPress, and news platforms. This challenge teaches the indexing and optimization skills used by database administrators and backend engineers at scale.
requirements: Create indexes for frequently queried fields
Build text search with MongoDB text indexes
Create compound indexes for complex queries
bonus_points: Add index usage statistics and recommendations
Add query plan analysis and optimization
